name: QueenBeeCleaning
0:
”Alexa, launch queen bee cleaning”
”Alexa, open queen bee cleaning”
”Alexa, start queen bee cleaning”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: queen bee cleaning
Developer Terms of Use
des:
We are Seattle’s leading residential cleaning service offering thorough, reliable cleaning from top to bottom and everywhere in between. When you need premium cleaning services at a price that makes sense, contact us today and experience the Queen Bee difference.

How to use -
--You can schedule a cleaning service
--You can also ask Alexa for your booking status. 

For the best experience, we need your email, mobile number, address and full name. Please give permission for the same and update details for it in the Alexa app under device settings.

Get Started:
To Get Started: Say "Alexa, open ‘queen bee cleaning’".

Place an order
Say ‘Book a service’ after Alexa completes the introduction to book a new service. Specify date and time for service.

Accepted inputs for date and time:
- Follow your alexa instructs for the same or check below examples
Date: 14th December or this Saturday [in this case it will pick up the first Saturday from the day of booking], or tomorrow or today.
Time: 9 AM/PM
You can also share special notes if any.

Track your booking
If you just want to track the status of your booking then you can say, “Alexa, ask ‘queen bee cleaning’, for status of my booking". Alexa will give you the current status of your booking if you have a running booking in place.
